item.title: Notorious Edmond Safra arsonist is back behind bars—where he allegedly tried to kill off his wife
item.description: Ted Maher — who set a fire that killed banker Edmond Safra — is reportedly suffering from throat cancer as he awaits a June 3 court appearance for allegedly trying to put a hit on his wife.

item.title: Mother details how she discovered intruder who sexually assaulted, choked her was her deranged ex-husband
item.description: “No one had ever believed he was a bad person.”

item.title: Man named ‘Optimus Prime’ caught driving stolen car: Texas police
item.description: Austin, Texas law enforcement officials arrested a man with the name of a famous "Autobot" leader last week, after he allegedly stole a vehicle.

item.title: Tween terror: Cops nab ‘very dangerous’ boy, 11, after violent crime spree including burglary, shooting
item.description: An 11-year-old pint-sized perp from hell terrorized Albuquerque for weeks, netting himself a rap sheet already worthy of a career criminal with charges including shootings, burglaries and auto theft, cops say.

item.title: ‘Bogeyman’ burglar jailed after being found under boy’s bed wearing the child’s pants
item.description: A 'Bogeyman' burglar discovered hiding under a boy's bed - naked apart from the child's own pants - has been jailed.

item.title: Robber takes 3 hostages in NYC, holds gun to victim’s head during 2-hour standoff with cops
item.description: When police arrived they found the front door barricaded shut with “multiple chairs."

item.title: New York social worker, 56, clinging to life after savage beating during home visit
item.description: Authorities have arrested her attacker, 31-year-old Hasseem Jenkins, and charged him with attempted murder and assault with intent to cause physical injury, according to online court records.

item.title: Creep steals plaque from flower bed memorializing late NYC audio engineer: video
item.description: The bizarre heist happened just after 9 a.m. on May 27, when a man in a cap used the claw end of a hammer to remove the memorial honoring Ron Allaire, surveillance video shows.

item.title: Champion US baton twirler wins $4.2M verdict after being sexually assaulted during nightmare trip to Peru
item.description: The victim testified during the 2.5 week trial against the Nassau County-based USTA, chaperone Koralea Slagle and association president Karen Cammer.

item.title: Video shows NYC migrant’s ‘sickening’ alleged bid to extort driver by jumping in front of moving car
item.description: “All of the sudden, I see a man in front of my car with eyes wide open, screaming, staring at me ... He was trying to get me to run him over,” recalled the driver.

item.title: Disgraced kids’ magician arrested on child porn charges — with local pol ex-wife being told to step down for allegedly knowing about it
item.description: Angry parents in a New Jersey suburb are calling on a local politician to step down following the recent arrest of her ex-husband — a disgraced children's magician — on child-porn charges.

item.title: Socialist NYC pol Emily Gallagher screams ‘safe streets’ but blocks hydrants and ran a red light
item.description: Assembly Member Emily Gallagher (D-Brooklyn) hates cars — except her own. The upstate-transplant socialist and “safe streets” lover has notched at least 46 (!!!) tickets these past 2½ years, for a total of more than $4,000. Turns out the white Buick of this tatted tribune of the people was caught illegally blocking fire hydrants. Power...

item.title: Connecticut residents form armed group to defend against violent crime
item.description: The 40 or so volunteers in Hartford have legal permits to carry concealed weapons and the purpose is self-defense.

item.title: Saquon Barkley’s dad claimed family needed pink gun found in car ‘because of who my son is’: court docs
item.description: Alibay Barkley, 55, was pulled over for covered license plates Wednesday evening at East 140th Street and Third Avenue in Mott Haven, according to a complaint filed in Bronx Criminal Court.

item.title: Man slashed in the neck near Astor Place Cube by random attacker: ‘Just exploded out of nowhere’
item.description: The victim was cut in the back of the neck at Lafayette Square and Cooper Avenue around 5:22 p.m. Thursday, police said.

item.title: NFL star Xavien Howard shared ‘revenge porn’ photos, videos with victim’s minor son: lawsuit
item.description: “Among other forms of revenge to Mother, and most notable, Howard texted sexually explicit material of Mother engaged in an explicit sex act with Howard to John Doe, who was a minor at the time.”

item.title: US Olympian Roy Martin’s medals, trophies stolen from his Texas storage unit: ‘My history is gone’
item.description: “I earned all that. Everything I accomplished, I earned it. And that was my history. Now, my history is gone.”

item.title: Florida man allegedly tells police he is ‘Mr. Monopoly,’ goes directly to jail
item.description: Ryan Howard, 33, is charged with resisting arrest and criminal mischief.

item.title: Migrant stabbed outside NYC shelter after sitting on attacker’s moped
item.description: A 22-year-old migrant was stabbed outside a Brooklyn shelter Thursday — all because he sat on his attacker's electric moped, sources said.

item.title: NYC set to send parents info on how to safely store guns after 14-year-old was accidentally killed by cousin
item.description: Jasai Guy was killed with an illegal, sawed-off shotgun that the two boys found at their grandfather's apartment.
